anything.translation[0].definitions[0].d: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which
anything.translation[0].definitions[0].e: You can buy anything you want.
He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
Anything would be better than staying at home!
You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
anything.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Is there anything I can do to help?
Do you want anything from the shops?
Would you like anything else to eat?
anything.translation[0].definitions[2].d: used in negative sentences to mean no thing, event etc
anything.translation[0].definitions[2].e: We didn’t have anything to eat for three days.
Don’t do anything until we get there.
